View Javadoc
1   package org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.entity;
2   
3   import org.hibernate.cache.CacheException;
4   import org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.access.PutFromLoadValidator;
5   import org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.impl.BaseTransactionalDataRegion;
6   import org.hibernate.cache.spi.CacheDataDescription;
7   import org.hibernate.cache.spi.EntityRegion;
8   import org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory;
9   import org.hibernate.cache.spi.access.AccessType;
10  import org.hibernate.cache.spi.access.EntityRegionAccessStrategy;
11  
12  import org.infinispan.AdvancedCache;
13  
14  /**
15   * @author Chris Bredesen
16   * @author Galder Zamarre√±o
17   * @since 3.5
18   */
19  public class EntityRegionImpl extends BaseTransactionalDataRegion implements EntityRegion {
20  
21  	public EntityRegionImpl(AdvancedCache cache, String name,
22  							CacheDataDescription metadata, RegionFactory factory) {
23  		super( cache, name, metadata, factory );
24  	}
25  
26  	@Override
27  	public EntityRegionAccessStrategy buildAccessStrategy(AccessType accessType) throws CacheException {
28  		switch ( accessType ) {
29  			case READ_ONLY:
30  				return new ReadOnlyAccess( this );
31  			case TRANSACTIONAL:
32  				return new TransactionalAccess( this );
33  			default:
34  				throw new CacheException( "Unsupported access type [" + accessType.getExternalName() + "]" );
35  		}
36  	}
37  
38  	public PutFromLoadValidator getPutFromLoadValidator() {
39  		return new PutFromLoadValidator( cache );
40  	}
41  
42  }
